data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_3ecd2c0843df7ec85044dafff6bf4553.png

skilllist.skilldesc: When Minotaur applies a control effect to an enemy hero with a skill, he will also reduce their Hybrid Defense by 5 (+0.5*Hero Level). When Minotaur heals an allied hero with a skill, he will also increase their Hybrid Defense by 5 (+0.5*Hero Level) for 2s. These effects are doubled in Enraged state.

Minotaur jumps to the target location, dealing 280<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in the area and briefly knocking them airborne. Enemies hit will also be slowed by 40% while Minotaur enhances his Basic Attacks to deal <font color="26e407"> (+3% Total HP)</font> extra <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> for 2s.

<font color="a6aafb">Enraged</font>: Increases the AOE range and the damage dealt by <font color="26e407"> (+3% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

Minotaur motivates himself and nearby allied heroes, recovering 220<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> HP to them and healing himself for 5% of his Lost HP.

<font color="a6aafb">Enraged</font>: Minotaur gains <font color="a6aafb">Enraged Regen</font> for 2s, during which he recovers HP equal to 100% of the damage taken from an enemy hero's Basic Attack.

Minotaur enters <font color="a6aafb">Enraged</font> state and smashes the ground 3 times. The first 2 hits deal 180<font color="fba51f"> (+85% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slow them by 40%, while the final hit deals 200<font color="ffe63c"> (+85% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> and knocks targets airborne. Minotaur is immune to control effects during this attack.

The <font color="a6aafb">Enraged</font> state lasts 12s and enhances Minotaur's skills for the duration.

data.name: Minotaur

+500 Extra Max HP
+10 Extra Physical Defense

emblemskill.skilldesc: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: When HP is below <%Num1>, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by <Num2>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers <%Num1> of Max HP.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Passive - Favor:
equiplist.equipskill3: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskill6: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Favor: 
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equiptips:
+12% Healing Effect
+60 Magic Power
+300 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+850 Extra Max HP
+20 Extra Physical Defense
+20 Extra Magic Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill3: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskill6: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Favor: 
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equiptips:
+12% Healing Effect
+60 Magic Power
+300 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+850 Extra Max HP
+20 Extra Physical Defense
+20 Extra Magic Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

recommendmasterplan.name: KUYAKEN
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Minoan prince determined to restore his homeland.

assist.desc: Minotaur works best with burst damage Marksmen, such as Granger and Melissa, since his CC's give them more opportunities to deal damage.

strong.desc: Minotaur is strong against heroes that rely on chaining skills or attacks, like Paquito and Julian because he can interrupt their combos with his CC.

weak.desc: Minotaur is countered by long-range Marksmen like Layla and Lesley since his lack of speed makes him an easy target.
